oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Untersuchungen zur agronomischen Vorzüglichkeit von Milchviehhaltungssystemen im Ökologischen Landbau
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Leisen, E.
Rieger, T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A comparison of farms with different milk yields, grazing intensities and concentrate feeding shows: cost efficient milk production is frequently achieved with below-average milk yields; on the other hand there were hardly any differences found be-tween grazing times during the summer and concentrate rates per cow during the year. However, strategies of individual farms could show advantages for less intensive and intensive farm management strategies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Leisen, E. and Rieger, T. (2007) Untersuchungen zur agronomischen Vorzüglichkeit von Milchviehhaltungssystemen im Ökologischen Landbau. [Investigations of agronomic advantages and disadvantages of dairy-cow milk-ing systems in organic farming.] Poster at: Zwischen Tradition und Globalisierung - 9. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Universität Hohenheim, Stuttgart, Deutschland, 20.-23.03.2007.
